import { Story, Preview, Props } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";

# ProgressBar
```import { ProgressBar } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

ProgressBar contain 3 props:

## linewidth

The props of **linewidth** assign for width of wrapper progress bar

## meter

The props of **meter** assign for color of progress bar

## meterwidth

The props of **meterwidth** assign for width of progress bar
